data.actual_result: You will notice several strange behavior in chat: Other people's nickname and color in chat will be reset for a split second ; the New Messages banner will disappear if there was one, and if you do this on a channel with a "Welcome to your server" header, this header will disappear for a split second as well. Basically it looks like changing presence status breaks a part of the cache, causing stuff to reload.
data.expected_result: You change status and nothing strange should happen in chat
data.short_description: Changing presence status causes some odd reload behavior in chat
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to any channel with different people chatting - Change your presence status - Immediately close channel drawer and come back to chat - Wait up to 10 seconds.
